turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to make an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What Starbucks would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to place my order at the Starbucks in Flower Mound off of Long Prairie Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order one Cherry Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it to be a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two percent milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you also want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I will place that order for you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm. You wanted a Grande Cherry Mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I will send that order to the Starbucks off of Long Prairie Road in Flower Mound.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order should be ready shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have sent the receipt to your mobile device and you should receive it by text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.
